Disable the '{Materialized}' abilities of enemies.
Double the amount of {energy-symbol} you gain from from card effects this turn.
Double the number of cards you draw from card effects this turn.

This character's spark is equal to the number of cards in your void.

When you have no cards in your deck, you win the game.
